text.div:
This code system https://digitalware-klinic.github.io/fhir/indisa/CodeSystem/rates-modality-INDISA defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
OPEN AbiertaPlease. Request a description of this concept from INDISA.
FREE Libre elecciónPlease. Request a description of this concept from INDISA.
CLOSED CerradaPlease. Request a description of this concept from INDISA.
PREFERRED PreferentePlease. Request a description of this concept from INDISA.
GES-CAEC GES-CAECPlease. Request a description of this concept from INDISA.

name: rates-modality-INDISA
description: This is a coding system that contains the rate modality codes for the interoperability scenario of INDISA (Chile).
